Command *to*
*************

Documentation for the to command in */trans/cmds/to.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE: ``to <command>``

Loads the editor, where you can enter parameters for the specified command.
On exiting the editor (with '\*\*'), the verb is executed with those parameters.
